nodes.documentation:
The TrustedProxy contract represents a single method on a host contract. This one is specifically designed for use with the MembershipController.
 *  It stores the address of the host contract and the method id of the method so that it can invoke the method when a user sends funds to this contract's address.
 *  It stores a recipient address that will receive any retrieved tokens.
 *  Note: This version is a Trusted variant of the standard Proxy contract that allows an authorized address to call functions in addition to the owner.
nodes.name: TrustedProxy
